p: Seventy Thai medicinal plant extracts were screened for their ability to inhibit pancreatic lipase activity at a concentration of 0.5 mg/mL, enhance lipolysis, and reduce lipid accumulation at a concentration of 0.05 mg/mL in order to select initial candidates. Each method had a specific criterion for efficacy as written below. Plants exhibiting activity in at least two in vitro assays were considered candidates for further analysis. The detailed results of these assays are summarized in Table S1.
